channel.title: 当时明月在
channel.description: 2023,我只想做一个不用翻身的咸鱼

item.title: 一. 线代基础
二. 积分例题
item.description: <p><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mtext>设函数</mtext><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>在</mtext><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>l</mi><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>l</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mtext>上连续，则</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mtext>如果</mtext><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>为奇函数，难么</mtext><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mi>x</mi></msubsup><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi><mtext>必为偶函数，</mtext><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mtext>如果</mtext><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext>为偶函数，难么</mtext><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mi>x</mi></msubsup><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi><mtext>必为奇函数。</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">设函数f(x)在[-l,l]上连续，则\\ 如果f(x)为奇函数，难么\int_0^xf(t)dt必为偶函数，\\ 如果f(x)为偶函数，难么\int_0^xf(t)dt必为奇函数。 </annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">设</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">函</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">数</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.10764em;">f</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">在</span><span class="mopen">[</span><span class="mord">−</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.01968em;">l</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.01968em;">l</span><span class="mclose">]</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">上</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">连</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">续</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">，</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">则</span></span><span class="mspace newline"></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:2.326242em;vertical-align:-0.9119499999999999em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">如</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">果</span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.10764em;">f</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">为</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">奇</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">函</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">数</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">，</span><span style="height:1.414292em;"><span style="top:-1.7880500000000001em;margin-left:-0.44445em;margin-right:0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mtight">0</span></span></span><span style="top:-3.8129000000000004em;margin-right:0.05em;"><span class="pstrut" style="height:2.7em;"></span><span class="sizing reset-size6 size3 mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">x</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s">​</span></span><span class="vlist-r"><span class="vlist" style="height:0.9119499999999999em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.16666666666666666em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right:0.10764em;">f</span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord mathnormal">t</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="mord mathnormal">d</span><span class="mord mathnormal">t</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">必</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">为</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">奇</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">函</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">数</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">。</span></span></span></span></span></p> <p><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msubsup><msup><mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mo><mi>n</mi></msup><mi>x</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msubsup><msup><mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mo><mi>n</mi></msup><mi>x</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">{</mo><mtable rowspacing="0.3599999999999999em" columnalign="left left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo>⋅</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>⋯</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>⋅</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo separator="true">,</mo><mi>n</mi><mtext>为正偶数</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo>⋅</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>⋯</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>，</mtext><mi>n</mi><mtext>为大于</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>的奇数</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mi>π</mi></msubsup><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>0</mn><mi>π</mi></msubsup><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\sin^nxdx=\int_0^{\frac{\pi}{2}}\cos^nxdx =\begin{cases} \frac{n-1}{n}\cdot\frac{n-3}{n-2}\cdots\frac{1}{2}\cdot\frac{\pi}{2},n为正偶数\\ \frac{n-1}{n}\cdot\frac{n-3}{n-2}\cdots\frac{2}{3}，n为大于1的奇数\\ \end{cases}\\ \int_0^{\pi}xf(\sin x)dx = \frac{\pi}{2}\int_0^{\pi}f(\sin x)dx </annotation></semantics></math></span><span
